title: Why do all the other icons move up a level when I delete an icon from the home screen?
answer: The auto-align function may be enabled, which enables your phone to automatically fill vacancy after you remove an application icon. To disable Auto-align, touch and hold a blank area on the home screen. Touch More settings > Auto-align and the home screen automatically fills the vacancy. If you don't want the home screen to automatically fill the vacancy, switch it off.
